text.section: In this section, "Service" means the Manure Matching Service.
The Department shall create a Manure Matching Service.
The purpose of the Service is to develop transfer programs and marketing techniques to promote and facilitate the transfer of poultry and livestock manure.
The Service shall be implemented in conjunction with the Manure Transportation Project set forth in § 8-704.2 of this subtitle.
The Governor shall include in the annual budget bill sufficient funds to carry out this section.
